<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Configuración de Granjas de Servidores Citrix ">3105d62cdb7573002ca60d53ca961963</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:4ea41eecdb0633002ca60d53ca9619aa</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>cantidadServers2019</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
	
	
	/*
	
	The following mandatory fields are not filled in: Solicitado por?, Descripción de la solicitud, Nombre del Servidor virtual, IP address, Nombre Servidor 1, IP servidor 1, Nombre Servidor 2, IP Servidor 2, Nombre Servidor 3, IP Servidor 3, Nombre Servidor 4, IP Servidor 4, Nombre Servidor 5, IP Servidor 5, Nombre Servidor 6, IP Servidor 6, Nombre Servidor 7, IP Servidor 7, Nombre Servidor 8, IP Servidor 8
	
	*/
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
			//Mandatory
		
			g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_3', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_4', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_5', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_6', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_7', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_8', false);
			
			
		
			g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_3', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_4', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_5', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_6', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_7', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_8', false);
		
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-12 03:55:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bbbc3eacdb8633002ca60d53ca961924</sys_id><sys_mod_count>39</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cantidadServers2019</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bbbc3eacdb8633002ca60d53ca961924</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>114190586</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-09 20:43:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Información de la Solicitud">1a10655cdb7933002ca60d53ca96198c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
